title: Field-Based Simulation Team Training for Enhancing Non-Technical Skills in Anesthesia Personnel

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Medical Knowledge and Teamwork Experience
context.additional_context: Course for Pre-Service Teachers to Learn Non-Technical Skills (Communication, Collaboration, Leadership, etc.) Applicable in Elementary Education Settings through Field-Based Simulation Team Training

learning_goals: Learners apply teamwork and communication skills with ≥80% accuracy in field simulation environments
Learners analyze and propose solutions for ≥3 conflict situations occurring in real educational settings through PBL projects
Learners record non-technical skill training content using digital tools in BYOD environments and write ≥2 reflective journals
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
